changeSet.createView: SELECT a.frozen_box_code,a.id,a.sample_type_name,a.status,a.memo,a.project_code,a.project_name,count_of_sample, a.equipment_code,a.area_code,a.support_rack_code,a.columns_in_shelf,a.rows_in_shelf, (a.equipment_code||'.'||a.area_code||'.'||a.support_rack_code ||'.'||a.columns_in_shelf || lpad(a.rows_in_shelf,2,0)) as position, sc.sample_classification_name,temp.stock_out_task_id FROM ( select rt.stock_out_task_id,frozen_box_id,count(1) as count_of_sample from stock_out_req_frozen_tube rt where rt.stock_out_task_id is not null group by rt.stock_out_task_id,frozen_box_id ) temp LEFT JOIN frozen_box a ON temp.frozen_box_id = a.id LEFT JOIN sample_classification sc ON a.sample_classification_id = sc.id
